title: Yair Golan’s Battle for a Two-State Solution and the Future of Israel - TORRE - Where Every News is a Story
text: Yair Golan’s Battle for a Two-State Solution and the Future of Israel To many Israelis, he’s a war hero. To others, he’s a traitor guilty of “blood libel.” Can Yair Golan change politics in Israel?
